body:
i'm thankful for [this joke](https://twitter.com/emmafromtoronto/status/912472647077855232), which made me laugh very hard several times.

i'm thankful that the evil racist stupid garbage human republicans in congress failed to repeal the affordable care act again.

i'm thankful that my ability to fall and stay asleep has continued to improve as the old antidepressant exits my body, and that though i have been a bit irritable i haven't had other side effects.

i'm thankful that i finished _the underground railroad_, which was very powerful and sad and which i recommend.

i'm thankful for the audio recordings from [this yale course about the civil war](https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-civil-war-and-reconstruction-era-1845-1877-audio/id341650730?mt=2) on itunes u, which is a very good listen.

i'm thankful that there is a new episode of _[food on franklin](https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/food-on-franklin/id1057688014?mt=2)_, which i am saving to savor.

i'm thankful we had a facetime call with my parents, who are excited because they got their first house-sitting job for their planned world tour (it's in new zealand!).

i'm thankful for "[pink matter](https://open.spotify.com/track/1fOkmYW3ZFkkjIdOZSf596)" in general and for andre 3000's voice in particular.

i'm thankful that i'm off work tomorrow and friday and saturday (though i have to work sunday), so today is like my friday.
